thread.section_title: Wyndham Garden Long Island City Manhattan View - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great budget hotel
thread.title_full: Great budget hotel - Review of Wyndham Garden Long Island City Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: leanne r
title: Great budget hotel
text: We stayed here for NYE. Great location just outside the city centre, walking distance to the underground. Nice room, clean and spacious as three of us stayed in the one room. The price was great value and the staff were friendly. There is a restaurant that served Asian fast food, not my thing so I would give it a miss. Go explore NYC....
